refnamediv.refpurpose: Used to eliminate unused vertices from a BOT primitive.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Used to eliminate unused vertices from a BOT primitive. It returns the number of vertices eliminated.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The examples shows the use of the bot_condense command to eliminate unused vertices from a BOT primitive and store the result in a new BOT primitive.

example.title: Basic Condensing
example.para: Eliminating unused vertices from a primitive named bot1_original and storing the result in a new primitive named bot1_condensed.

listitem.para: The unused vertices were deleted from bot1_original and the result was saved in bot1_condensed.
